title: Football Master 2019
description:
Football Master 2019 has arrived! Prepare to take on challenges from football managers from around the world!

Join the fastest growing mobile football community. Unleash your football skills to constantly changing and evolving format of the beautiful game. Team up with your friends to win league tournaments!

FOOTBALL MASTER is the most innovative, intriguing and intense Online Football Management Game. Create your prodigy as a legendary Football Manager by building your personal club from scratch to a World-Class champion by development through Scouting, Training, Build Up and participating in thrilling real-time Tournaments and World Leagues.

Start your Football Manager career now with Football Master 2019, crafted exclusively for your mobile devices. Now live football anytime, anywhere!

DREAM, TRAIN, BECOME:

•	Officially Licensed: With official licenses from football pioneer FIFPro, along with premier clubs in the Europe, you can now sign popular strikers, wingers, full-backs and goalkeepers. One Team...One Dream !!

•	Thousands of Athletes:
Scout, Develop, Trade and Play with your handpicked BEST XI, selected from thousands of choices. Sign...Train…Win... REPEAT !!

•	Stunning 3D Matches: 
Witness your First XI in action in captivating 360 degrees 3D stadium atmosphere. Live the complete football dream !!

•	Official Club Marks and Latest Team Kit: 
You can acquire Official Club Marks for personalizing your own club, along with the chance to dress your entire squad in latest 2018-19 Official Kits. Dress for the kill !!

•	Exciting & Competitive Leagues: 
Lead your team in various global game modes including Super League, Master League, Europa Championship, and Super Club Challenges. All Out... All Game... All Season !!

•	World-Class AI Performance: 
The entire football action is boosted by leading and powerful AI game engine promising flawless skills, thrilling goals and most realistic passes, crosses, dribbles and tackles. Flawless Gameplay… Each time.. Every time !!

•	Challenge Global Football Masters: 
You can challenge other managers from across the globe and win exciting rewards. To become the Best… Beat the Rest !!

SUPPORT：

To receive latest game news and updates:

LIKE US: facebook.com/FootballMaster2019
FOLLOW US: twitter.com/FMChain11
Contact US: In-game by going to Setting -> FAQs

© GALA Sports Technology Ltd.

The use of images and names of the football players in this game is under license from FIFPro Commercial Enterprises BV. FIFPro is a registered trademark of FIFPro Commercial Enterprises BV.

title: Football 2019
description:
An off-line soccer game with which you can form the team of your dreams and become the world champion. Enjoy this fantastic 2019 football simulator for free, signing star players, improving your skills and facing challenges at the 2019 World Stadium.

REALISTIC FOOTBALL
A cheap game with impressive graphics and 3D stadiums. Soccer players such as Lionel Messi, Cristiano Ronaldo, Neymar, Ronaldinho, among others who make the experience more realistic and challenging.

SHAPE, IMPROVE AND CHOOSE YOUR FAVORITE TEAM WITH TRUE STAR PLAYERS
A realistic and free simulation in your pocket, all in a single football package. A free sport simulation game in which you can win a league, cup or world cup championship with the great teams of the world Barcelona and Madrid.
If you like soccer games and management games of this sport, this is your game to prepare the 2019 World Cup and mark the winning goal of your team.
Mark incredible goals in football matches 2019; shoot penalties against the goalkeeper with the best foul and penalty kicks game. Become the soccer player of your dreams.
Do not wait any longer and get free Soccer 2019!

title: MLB Tap Sports Baseball 2019
description:
Dominate the league in MLB Tap Sports Baseball 2019! Build your roster of MLB All-Stars, then team up to build a dynasty!

Build YOUR Dynasty
• Log in to the same Game Center account to add your THREE favorite players from 2018 to your 2019 roster
• Create your very own legend and add him to your roster
• Win or draft new players for your roster. New MLB stars, legends and all-time greats added every week
• Up your All-Star level to earn new perks and even better rewards that will help you every day in the ballpark
 
Play Together, Win Together
• Brand new Club Profiles let you show off your accomplishments to the Tap Sports Baseball universe!
• Revamped chat makes playing together much more fun and rewarding
• New club matching system puts you right in the competition
• Your club can take on every team in Tap Sports Baseball in fresh new club events every day
• All new perks and rewards for joining and competing in clubs
 
24/7/365 Baseball Action
• Play with official MLB Teams and MLBPA Players 
• Swing for the fences in numerous modes: Slugfest, Home Run Battles, Walk Off Hero, Pick’em and many more
• Collect MLB superstars from retired legends to present day heroes
• Compete in new events and competitions every day that mimic the REAL events of the MLB 
• Tap to swing with easy one-touch controls – tap one out of the ballpark anytime and anywhere 

Download now to build YOUR MLB roster, build YOUR MLB dynasty, and dominate the ballpark year-round in MLB Tap Sports Baseball 2019!

Officially Licensed Product of MLB Players, Inc. 
 
MLBPA trademarks, copyrighted works and other intellectual property rights are owned and/or held by MLBPA and may not be used without the written consent of MLBPA or MLB Players, Inc. 
 
Visit www.MLBPLAYERS.com, the Players Choice on the web.

TSB19 Subscriptions
• CvC Edge ($9.99 USD/wk): 1 player on purchase, batting boost, starting multiplier boost & additional retry options in CvC
• Bonus XP Box ($9.99 USD/wk): 1 player on purchase, daily reward box
• Prime XP Bonus Box ($19.99 USD/wk): 1 player on purchase, daily reward box
• VIP Elite ($49.99 USD/wk): 1 player on purchase, bonus gold on all IAP, lower gold costs for mystery boxes
• VIP Power Parcel ($99.99 USD/wk): 1 player on purchase, daily reward box
• The Five Tool Box ($2.99 USD/wk): 7 day free trial, 1 player on purchase, daily reward box
• VIP Prime XP Bonus Box  & VIP Legend XP Bonus Box ($99.99 USD/wk): 1 time gold reward, daily reward box
• Prime XP Bonus Box 2 & Legend XP Bonus Box 2 ($49.99 USD/wk): 1 time gold reward, daily reward box

Subscriptions available via in-app purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew at the applicable subscription price at the end of the subscription period until you cancel your subscription. Payment for the subscription period you select will be charged to your Google account within 24-hours prior to the end of the current subscription period. Cancel your subscription at any time by accessing your Google Account Settings. After canceling, you are responsible for the fee for the current active applicable subscription period.
Privacy Policy: https://www.glu.com/privacy
Terms of use: http://www.glu.com/terms

NOTE:
- Game is free to play, but real money is required for some items and charges your Google account. Disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- Game permits users to interact with one another (e.g. chat rooms, player to player chat) depending on the availability of features. Linking to social networking sites not intended for persons ineligible under applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- Network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, see our privacy policy: www.Glu.com/privacy
- For problems with this game, contact us @ www.Glu.com/support

FOLLOW US at:
Twitter @glumobile

comments: Add a swing chart! How am I supposed to adjust my timing when I don't have any information on my swing ?? Either a pop fly or straight to the pitcher. This game is literally just guessing. Also, when doing the home run contest, my players hit home runs and 99% of the time hit the back wall but when playing a real game they can't even make to the out field. Same hit. Same player. Different dynamics. Love the logic 👍

Extremely glitchy game. To many videos to watch. At first any cost was limited but this has changed dramatically. You need special players to compete in events. They give free chances to get them but more often then not you dont get them,so it forces a person to buy gold and boxes to get them,if you dont you won't be able to compete. Costs have soared on this game,I've been playing now for 3 years and a VIP which means I buy but it's getting to be too much.

Customer service is very unhelpful when you need it. They make you run in circles over and over for their own amusement. Before the last 3 days I would have said they were excellent. No that the game has graduated to major pay to play everything is going down hill. I believe they actually dont care about the player at all, just how much they can scam you to pay.

"Free" options to play but to be competitive in events need to spend money. Not recommending now. Invested money to build up a really strong team. New edition 2020 came out and must essentially start over as a rookie. Only transfer 3 players, lost all highly developed players, onhand gold and cash in account. It's designed to take your money.

I really want to say this I a good game because ai like baseball and I've been playing tsb for a while. I can't do that because of the pitchers. Every single pitch the game kind of freezes for a second and it really throws my timing off. Also when that happens I can barely see the ball because it's like everything speeds up. I hope they fix this in tsb 20

title: WWE Champions 2019
description:
Play the #1 downloaded WWE game. In WWE Champions 2020, enjoy action RPG and puzzle fighter battles. Compete in contests based on NXT, Raw, Smackdown and more. Collect over 200 Superstars including The Rock, Brock Lesnar, Hulk Hogan, Ronda Rousey, and Becky Lynch. Join over 35 million players and feel the excitement of the WWE Universe. Compete on the Road to WrestleMania in the ultimate match 3 RPG!

===GAME FEATURES===

COLLECT OVER 200 WWE SUPERSTARS AND LEGENDS
* The Rock, Roman Reigns, Alexa Bliss, and John Cena - Start your roster with top WWE Superstars and Legends
* Hulk Hogan, Andre the Giant, and more - Add legendary heavyweights to your team.
* Choose The Undertaker, Stone Cold Steve Austin, and all-time Attitude Era icons.
* Add Ronda Rousey, Becky Lynch, Charlotte Flair and other top Women’s Superstars
* The NWO, New Day, DX, and all the greatest factions are here.
* Lucha libre greats like Rey Mysterio, MMA veterans like Brock Lesnar, and more await. Choose your style!

ACTION RPG GAME, WWE STYLE
* Use RPG skills to earn XP in this unique RPG Puzzle Battle Game.
* Win matches to customize moves and upgrade your team.
* Action RPG gameplay lets you combine a variety of skills.
* Hire Trainers to boost your Superstars’ abilities.
* Strategize! Pick the best Class to beat opponents. Choose from Technicians, Strikers, and more.

WORLD WRESTLING ENTERTAINMENT EVENTS & CONTESTS
* Join the WWE Universe in new weekly bouts and fighting game events
* NXT, Monday Night RAW, and SmackDown themed battles
* From WrestleMania to SummerSlam, play events inspired by WWE Network Pay-Per-Views
* Enter monthly title events and recruit up-and-coming WWE Superstars
* Rank up from NXT beginnings to main eventing arenas around the world
* In-game Contests update every week to match on-air and World Wrestling Entertainment schedules

MATCH 3 RPG PUZZLE BATTLES MEET WWE MOVES
* Match 3 gems to obliterate rivals
* Use signature WWE Superstar moves
* Upgrade to use the Rock Bottom, Attitude Adjustment, Styles Clash and more.
* Puzzle fighting RPG combos and finishing moves

NEW CUSTOM TITLES WITH ABILITIES & BUFFS
* Collect straps and and medals to craft specialized Titles
* Customize and upgrade each Title. Thousands of different combinations
* Equip Superstars before the start of every match to gain a competitive edge

PVP SHOWDOWNS
* PvP WWE battles with enhanced worldwide multiplayer matchmaking
* Showdown Shop store delivers exclusive rewards & prizes
* Simultaneous tournaments for men’s, women’s, and mixed tag teams.

FACTIONS & ALLIANCES, WWE STYLE
* Join a Faction to play with friends and to heal and help teammates
* Strategize with Faction members in your own Headquarters
* Exclusive Faction Missions earn rewards and loot


VIP MEMBERSHIP SUBSCRIPTIONS
* Subscribe to WWE Champions exclusive memberships
* Play as Triple H - King of Kings, DX Triple H, or DX Shawn Michaels
* Access to exclusive content, contests and special rewards


**WINNER! 2018 Webby People's Voice Award (Sports Games)**



Free trials will convert to a recurring subscription after 7 days (if applicable). The payment shown in the price and payment schedule at time of sign up for the tier selected will be charged to your account when the subscription begins, and it will auto-renew as described unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of a subscription period. Renewal payments will be charged within 24 hours before the end of a subscription period on the same price and payment schedule you selected . Unused portions of free trials will be forfeited upon purchase of a subscription. You can manage subscriptions and turn off auto-renewals in your device account settings.

Terms of Service: http://scopely.com/tos/
Privacy Policy: http://scopely.com/privacy/
Additional Information, Rights, and Choices Available to California Players: https://scopely.com/privacy/#additionalinfo-california.

comments: It's a fun game. Of course it's a typical pay to win game. The only issue I have so far is.. I paid for a membership (Here Comes The Money Pass) costing $39.99/6mo. This includes access to the Champions Club. But in the Limited Time Battle "NWO Ransacks Wrestlemania Book 1" when I try to play the Champions Club Circuit it says "Champions Club Required" & will not allow me to play it. When I pay for a service I expect access to the content I paid for. I will probably be canceling my membership.

Was fun to start. Been playing for a few years and have spent quite a bit of money on the game with extra purchases but when they offer free characters it doesn't work and when you talk to the customer service through chat the take forever to respond and it's an automated answer. This is bs and the false advertisements should get them in some issues with the BBB.

Got a different phone after the game tells me my old phone wasn't compatible for updates. Now I loaded the game on the new phone and lost everything from money, coin, health, and superstars. I mine everything. What is the problem? I'm not starting over from nothing. I spent to much time and money building it up to start over.

Other the unnecessary upgrades this is a great game. Where ur not forced to buy things to be able to play. But as 2020 when I first started 2 years ago they have got like other games an have a pay wall as it called an u r kind of forced to buy to participate in events to have a chance an that doesn't even promise a chance can spend ur money an get nothing

Fun game. Typical gem match. Unfortunately Scopely seems to be more interested in satisfying streamers and whales and leaves the average everyday player in the dust. 99% of the contests can't be completed because most players don't have the necessary roster needed (see "can't afford to shell out thousands of dollars"). Scopely also likes to introduce new concepts to improve roster only to scrap it a few months later.

title: Dream League Soccer 2020
description:
Dream League Soccer 2020 puts you in the heart of the action with a fresh look and brand new features! Build your dream team from over 3,500 FIFPro™ licensed players and take to the field against the world’s best soccer clubs! Rise through 8 divisions whilst enjoying full 3D motion-captured player moves, immersive in-game commentary, team customisations and much more. The beautiful game has never been so good!

BUILD YOUR DREAM TEAM
Sign top superstar players such as Luis Suarez & Gareth Bale to create your very own Dream Team! Perfect your style, develop your players and take on any team who stands in your way as you rise through the ranks. Upgrade your stadium with world-class facilities as you make your way to the Legendary Division. Have you got what it takes?

NEW AND IMPROVED GAMEPLAY 
The very best Dream League Soccer experience awaits with new animations and improved AI we’ve revolutionised the most engaging football experience on mobile. Dream League Soccer 2020 is the perfect soccer package, one which captures the true spirit of the beautiful game.

DRESSED FOR SUCCESS
Feast your eyes on the best-looking Dream League Soccer experience ever! Customise your manager from a host of different options including hairstyles and outfits. Along with our new and improved graphics engine, your dream team has never looked this good!

CONQUER THE WORLD
Dream League Live puts your club against the very best in the world. Work your way through the ranks to prove your team is the greatest and compete in Global Leaderboards and Events for exclusive prizes!

FEATURES
•	Build and develop your dream team from over 3,500 FIFPro™ licensed players
•	Full 3D motion-captured kicks, tackles, celebrations and goalkeeper saves gives unmatched realism
•	Reach legendary status as you rise through 8 divisions and compete in more than 10 cup competitions
•	Build your soccer empire from your own Stadium to Medical, Commercial and Training facilities
•	Recruit Agents and Scouts to help identify top talent in the transfer market
•	Immersive and exciting match commentary keeps you in the heart of the action
•	Use Coaches to develop your players technical and physical abilities
•	Customise your team’s kit and logo or import your own creations 
•	Take part in regular events to win fantastic prizes
•	Compete against players from across the globe with Dream League Live
•	Our biggest soundtrack EVER! Featuring The Luka State, Sunset Sons, Vistas and more!

* Please note: This game is free to play, but additional content and in-game items may be purchased for real money. 
* This game requires an internet connection and contains third party advertising.

comments: Bad news first. The ball is sometimes very hard to see because it is a light colored ball. Also, the free kick controls are not improved in my opinion, THEY ARE NOT bad, just not any better than DLS 19 free kick controls. The good is, I love the fact that they listened to me, because I very strongly recommended to add npc characters on the sidelines, and they did, and now the players and coach have good programming, the coach stops a ball if it hits him. The graphics and gameplay is better too..

The new update and the version is a complete disgrace. This used to be one of the best soccer game on mobile. But now its literally unplayable. Controls are horrible and it always ends up into a wrong pass. Freekicks are waste of time. There is nothing which can help to shoot the ball in the direction you want. Its completely a money making game now. Players not available and if u wanna use real cash then its huge. Terribly disappointed with the game. Uninstalling it.

This game has most certainly gone downhill. I don't like the system of gems, I would rather it be all about coins again. I miss the days where you could buy Messi for your lowest league team. It may just be me, but this game is quite easy, with a 3 and a bit rated, I was able to beat Man. City, Man. United, Juventus and Barcelona comfortably with goals coming from players 60 rated and lower. This should not be the case as in previous versions I would struggle with a low rate team

I like it all in all but still needs a lot of work. Controls are unstable at all. Refs are not accurate enough, for example, I had a case where I was 1 -on- 1 with the GK outside the penalty box and I passed to my teammate before I was tackled by him. My teammate was in front of the open goal only for the ref. to blow the whistle for a free kick with no booking. In real life, this should have been a goal scored by means of advantage and then a red card to GK! That's a big difference tbh

The old game was better. This game is really good and has the potential to be better than the first game but first, there are a few issues to be fixed. 1. My strikers are ALWAYS offside. It is definitely one of the most defining flaws in the game 2. Make it so that there's no weather. When the atmosphere is rainy or dull, you can't see the ball clearly. 3. There are too many adds. 4. Swapping players when the ball is in free play is difficult 5. You should be able to sell players

title: eFootball PES 2020
description:
The latest update to PES 2020 mobile (v4.3.1) was released on 03/12/2020.
Approximately 1.6 GB of free space will be required to install this update, so please confirm that you have enough room on your device before beginning the download.
Given the size of the file, we highly recommend that you connect to a Wi-Fi network to download it.
Additionally, we have received reports from some users indicating that Google Play does not always display the correct download size.
As a result, we urge you to wait a while even after the download progress bar has reached 100% to ensure that your device is able to finish downloading the complete file.
If the file doesn't finish downloading, you will be unable to start the game. You will also not be able to complete the update if you do not have enough space to install the file.
We realize that this process is counterintuitive, and we apologize for any inconvenience caused.
Furthermore, as a show of appreciation for your continued support, all users that download the v4.3.1 update by 01:59 (UTC) on 03/09/2020 and open the Inbox will receive a "Black Ball" Special Agent.
Once again, we thank you all for your continued support of PES 2020.

■ Experience eFootball's Online Mobile Matchplay
Here at the PES team, the eFootball PES 2020 mobile update represents another tremendous stride towards realizing our goal of providing fans with the most immersive competitive soccer simulation ever created.
For us, the core concept of PES is defined by the type of heart-stopping thrills that can only be experienced when facing off against real people in real time. This idea is embodied by our new title: eFootball, which symbolizes an unprecedented fusion between esports and soccer. In alignment with this, PES 2020 will redouble the series’ focus on providing fans the world over with fun and creative ways to compete against one another, in both local and online multiplayer.

■ The Thrill of Console Soccer on Your Mobile Device
With eFootball PES 2020, we've taken the same critically acclaimed console gameplay that won E3 2019's "Best Sports Game" award, and distilled its essence to bring you the most authentic mobile soccer experience to date. Take creative command of the ball like never before thanks to the brand-new "Finesse Dribble" technique, developed in collaboration with iconic Spanish midfielder Andrés Iniesta. Other enhancements to trapping and overall ball control will also enable you to take advantage of small differences in the way each player plays on the field. We've also added the "Inspire" system, which allows certain players to influence the way in which nearby teammates behave. The sum total of these parts is an experience that accentuates player individuality, lending increased importance to choosing the right players for the right situations and tweaking your formation to perfection.

■ Real-Time, Online Matches
Experience local matchplay with a friend on the same couch, or register a friend online to play together over the internet. In "eFootball", you can face off against users from around the world, enter time-limited competitive events, and enjoy the very best high-intensity esports gameplay.

■ New items added to the SHOP:
- 7 purchasable squads
- "myClub Coins + Bonus" packs
*See the SHOP for details

[System Requirements]
This app is an online game.  Please enjoy the game with stable internet connection.

[Title Display]
If you select Japanese in the language settings of the game application, “eFootball Winning Eleven 2020” will be displayed. If you select a language other than Japanese, “eFootball PES 2020” will be displayed.

comments: The reason im giving this 4 stars, it's because of the gameplay, yes it is really fun, but there are some things that i would improve, for example, the trade system i wish you can trade the players with other users that play PES and the other thing is the multiplayer system, somehow i cannot play with my friend, i don't know why but me and my friend have tried it more than several times and we cannot get it to happen. Thank you, hopefully this will help you guys in the future.

Is it just me or is the campaign mode so difficult to win? I mean I'm in level 21 so I don't expect it to be easy but then your telling me I can't win a single game? The opponent's defense is like an impenetrable wall and if by luck you happen to bypass it you either miss a lap in or the goal keeper saves it. There was some games where I was able to score but the opponent always managed to draw the game no matter how good I defend. I'm getting frustrated!!!!!!

Through passes are seriously difficult to make. Players require so much balancing to make even short passes. Three, four, five quick short passes are difficult to make and it's so frustrating. Players miss open goals more times than not and COM players are impossible to dispossess once they shield the ball. They turn their backs to you and you just have to wait for them to score cause you're not getting that ball. Good graphics overall but needs major improvement. Give us 2018 passing back!.

I really love this game but at this point,I have had enough and I can't stand the incompetence of the creators of the game. The game does so many updates however none of those updates are done on game play. I can think of ways that can make this game better yet the grown creators can't do that. Game play is so obnoxious. Starting with the keeper, in other for the keeper to come out you have take your hand off the pressure button and drag down in other to bring out the keeper which doesn't work

I really like the game play as well as the controls of the movement in general. But one thing that's ticking me off is that you cant play with a controller as well as it can't be that a player with 95-99 finishing rating misses an open goal sometimes or some really good chances. A problem with multi-player is that the controls don't connect as smoothly as at a match against the CPU. Overall a great game but needs some improvements

comments: The app is easy to use, but on the quick ten questions they just repeat. I had the answers memorized after only a 1 day of use. I dont even need to read the questions most of the time. It's a good thing i bought the full version so I can make my own quizzes. It would be helpful if their were more difficult questions. Also some of the graphs and questions do not correlate.

Some questions and answers don't relate to each other. Questions that require an image, have no image or wrong images. Example, i was asked to look at a map to determine something but the image shown was a graph. 3/10 of my first ten questions had issues, i Uninstalled.

Pretty good overall. However, there are a lot of questions that are missing half the texts in the questions, and there are very few questions without buying premium. But if the broken ones get fixed I'll give 5 stars.

There are not a lot of questions.. Less than 100 total. Also, the questions repeat. Then, once you are finished with those few questions that's it.. There is nothing else left to do. This app is terrible.

I paid for the app, but when doing the math test (say 30 questions) around 4-5 will be wrong, missing the picture or missing other info. also MORE questions are full of broken English and typos. not worth the money....

title: USA Calendar 2019 and 2020
description:
The calendar contains the National and State Holidays for 2019 and 2020.

Add individuality to the calendar with colors and icons. You may set the background and font color of your choice. Make it colorful to brighten up your day.

You may set the USA Calendar as widget. There are also widgets for Christmas and New Year count down.

You may also add your own daily, weekly, monthly or annual events. You can use it to track your own diary of events such as planning your vacation, sports events or your friends and families' birthdays. The events are tagged with colorful icons for easy reference. It is simple to create the events. You may create events within a short duration as well, by specifying the start and end dates of the event.

There is option to set the start of the week to either Monday or Sunday.

It is possible to show only relevant events, such as National Holiday, State Holidays by selecting particular states in the United States, Observances or Daylight Saving Time. It is also possible to set notifications of events.

Show more on calendar:
1. Week of year
2. Zodiac Sign
3. Buddhist Calendar
4. Chinese Calendar
5. Coptic Calendar
6. Ethiopic Calendar
7. Hebrew Calendar
8. Indian Calendar
9. Islamic Calendar
10. Japanese Calendar
11. Taiwanese Calendar
12. Vietnamese Calendar

In app icons courtesy of Icons8 (https://icons8.com/).

New features:
- Backup and restore of user events. Go to "Maintenance"

Please "Allow USA Calendar to access photos, media and files on your device" to enable the backup and restore. 

The backup file is stored in your mobile phone. We do not store the file in any servers.

- Added the option to create new repeated events using a user defined interval. Select Interval = "Others" and specify the number of days as interval.

- Added the option to delete a single user event, or a series of user events. This applies only to new events added using version 1.41.63 and above.

- Added moon phase. Enable this feature from "Settings".

- Added theme for calendar. You may now set your background and font with your preferred color.

- Added lock time zone feature

title: Extreme Speed Car Simulator 2019 (Beta)
description:
Extreme Speed Car Simulator 2019 is one of the best car simulator games of 2019 that comes with a realistic driving physics engine, huge open world, car customization, lots of fun and addicting gameplay.

If you are a car games enthusiast, you will definitely love this game to bits. Even if you cannot own your dream car in real life, you can at least build your garage, in the virtual realm, with some of the fastest cars in the world!

REAL DRIVING PHYSICS
Enjoy a new mobile racing game with upgraded realistic car physics engine from Mobimi Games, the creators of Car Simulator 2018. Extreme Speed Car Simulator 2019 is one of the best car driving simulator game for mobile with one of the best driving physics.
Get behind the wheel and test your driver skills while playing the most realistic car driving simulator for mobile!

OPEN WORLD MAP
A giant open world map is available for extreme speed driving. Drive your sports cars and perform asphalt burnouts, choose off road SUVs and drive them on the hills & mountain roads, or play the airport scene, race other cars and let impossible stunts entertain you.
Extreme Speed Car Simulator 2019 features amazing 3D environments like city, airport, highway, mountain roads, off road area, race track, all combined in one huge open world map that offers you the most realistic car driving experience on mobile.

ULTIMATE CAR COLLECTION
This car game gives you the opportunity to drive many vehicles such as: powerful supercars, muscle cars, racing cars, off road vehicles, SUVs, police cars, 4WD trucks and more. Newest cars with fastest engines and challenging gameplay are available for all racer lovers. More than 50 cars are waiting for you to drive and drift.
Collect some of the world’s fastest cars and create you dream car garage!

CAR CUSTOMIZATION
Create stunning cars in the garage, by choosing your dream car body, the perfect rims for it, apply your favorite paint color and show it to your friends.

BEST CAR SOUND EFFECTS
Real car engine sounds such as V8 engine sound, V6 engine sound and more are used in the game to give the player a real car experience.

CHECKPOINT MISSIONS
Complete the Checkpoint missions by driving at extreme speed, in order to reach all the checkpoints before the time runs out. Each mission has its own reward and the more missions you complete, the faster you will be able to unlock new extreme cars and to become the best driver in the city.

DRAG RACE
Choose the ultimate car from you garage, participate in drag racing events and try to be the first one that reaches the fishing line. Be a furious driver, use the manual or automatic gear shift and win each race. Use the nitro to get the ultimate speed boost you need to defeat the AI opponents.

FREE ROAM
Use the Free Car Driving mode, explore the map and try to find the hidden rewards (money and gold). Find all of them and you will complete the hidden rewards achievement (extra prize). Endless car driving is available in the Free Roam mode, gain miles and unlock new muscle cars and see for yourself which one is the best racing car.
Use the ramps in the city to perform illegal stunts and climb on the top of the buildings where you can fine more money and gold rewards.
While driving on the military airport, beware of the police duty car driver that guards the airport entrance. His goal is to not let anyone enter the area, but if you manage to enter, you will have to drive very fast, in order to lose the tail.

SPEED TRAPS 
Extreme car driving is all about speed, isn’t it? Be the fastest driver in order to complete all the Speed Traps and earn money which can be used to unlock new cars.

Download and play the best car driving game of 2019 now! 

100% free car simulator game

Please leave a review with your suggestions and we will try to implement it in the next updates. Thanks!

title: Horse Racing Manager 2019

Online races are here! 
--

• Introducing HRM TV, the hub for online horse racing!
• Live PVP races occur every 5 minutes!
• Will you be able to top the global leaderboard?

Become the number one horse racing manager to grace the tracks! Race, train, breed from the local derby to the Ultimate Championship.


FEATURES


RACE:

• Compete in the local derby, circuit, or cup to earn rewards and work your way toward the Ultimate Championship.
• Watch intense and suspenseful races just like the real spectator sport or skip ahead to get back to business.
• Play through a realistic and immersive calendar of races.
• Cross the finish line for a realistic photo finish. Stunning 3D visuals make Horse • Racing Manager 2019 the best virtual horse racing simulation experience around!

TRAIN:

• Manage a robust and efficient stable to raise the fiercest of thoroughbreds.
• Boost horse performance stats with food, rest and physical training.
• Improve and upgrade stats through a variety of training methods or breed horses to create the strongest bloodlines.
• Strategize routines that can vary in surface conditions, exertion levels and more.
• Maintain peak performance. Only the best race horse owners know how to keep their horses well rested, at an optimal weight, and race ready.
• Pack a few pounds on with some sugary treats. Try feeding your horse a handful of sugar cubes!
• Unlock additional stable slots to bolster an even more impressive roster of horse racing stars.

BREED:

• Buy, sell and breed horses to participate competitions and create a powerhouse stable full of speedy candidates.
• Match two horses with favorable traits to inherit special attributes and stats.
• Unlock special genetic traits such as unique colors or super speed using rare breeds
• Carefully breed unique skills that can only be obtained through breeding, and not training.
• Engage in events that can affect special Breeding Rights.
• 3D visuals showcase an impressive variety of unique colors, patterns, and traits acquired through breeding.

CUSTOMIZE:

• Choose a unique look for your jockey and horse with an assortment options.
• Adjust the outfits, emblems, and colors to suit your own personal taste.
• Bond with every horse in your stable by giving them individual names.
• Experiment with Breeding Rights to produce a foal with special physical traits.
• Create a nurturing environment for your horses to flourish!


Stop just watching the horse races and take part in the action. Saddle up cowboys, because the number one horse racing management sim is here! Can you be a world-class horse racing manager talked about from Kentucky to Epsom!? Become a horse racing legend now!


* PLEASE NOTE! Horse Racing Manager 2019 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.

Meet other players and find out more about Horse Racing Manager:

* Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/horseracingmanager2019

* Twitter: @HRM_2019 (http://twitter.com/HRM_2019)

* Privacy Policy: http://bit.ly/ThirdTimePRIVACY

* Terms of Service: http://bit.ly/ThirdTimeTOS

recentChanges:
Hello Racers and welcome to HRM 7.15!

We’ve made a few fixes and improvements that we’re looking forward to sharing:

• Gene Coins! Expect to see Gene Coin races show up in the Live Schedule as well as a few other places in the coming weeks
• Player Titles! Player Titles cannot be bought; If you have the title, it means you earned it
• New sorting functionality to the Breeding Page
• Daily Tournament Sales
• Bugfixes and Improvements
comments: excellent graphics and realism overall. can breed many horses and have up to 5 or 6 racing horses in your stable if expanded fully..with every update it gets better, not worse like some apps I've played..also very responsive player support. The developers really listen to their players needs and opinions..super job!
This is q great game, but it won't let me start over. I played this game when I was younger, and I did a pretty horrible job and a just want a fresh start, but I can't find a way to start over.
This game it's outstanding. I like it would only if the commentators could be able to talk then it would've been 10/10
Game is so addictive, support is 5 stars as well, very courteous, helpful, and professional.
Fun time consumer, basic and doesn't seem very P2W but I haven't went in an online race yet.. so who knows, I'm sure there are the classic 1000+ dollar spenders

Thank you for the Support.
comments: Controling problem without joystick

The game revolves around a cliché concept of enemies attacking you from all directions, leaving you to fend for yourself. Often, the distance between enemies is too great and the game becomes mundane. Parts of the map take a few seconds to load, but the graphics are tolerable. What i personally found intolerable, though, were the controls. You are barely given any flexibility to toggle the sensitivity. I acknowledge the devs efforts in making this Indie game. I hope to see some better work soon.
Controls are pathetic. Joystick option on screen & control to look around is horrible. Please fix these issues first.

Com8ng is a little different than the other one game but it is awesome game update to the game like get it open world games of high graphics and good control and like the mission of the game is a little different than the other one game but it is awesome to play with it all the way around the game and it really makes sense to me on basement of course lol cheers for your time off and the story of the day was great and the story went very smoothly with the new things that I did not take lightly

Wow nice game! I want this game must have Battle royale-Team mode as 4 person. Which is me and my 3 teammates! I play one person so alone! Can this game add another mode for team mode? I play only Solo(Single) player mode! Especially I want the game another second team mode can pick up anything that I want. Also Zombie Survival mode is Same as team mode I want. Can this game make it? I like it!

title: MLB Perfect Inning 2019
description:
Officially Licensed by the MLB
Keep the MLB season at your fingertips with MLB Perfect Inning 2019. Draft your favorite MLB players and build the ultimate fantasy team!

FEATURES:
- Climb to the top of the ranks as you face off against competitors worldwide in the all-new Club Battle mode
- Play head-to-head against friends real-time with Live Battle Action Play
- Build your franchise and recruit MLB's most promising talent
- Upgrade your favorite players past their limits with the new Rank Up system.
- Watch your star studded lineup improve with real-time stats updated with each MLB game
- Draft Legend Players to boost your team's performance
- Rise to the challenge with the new Master difficulty being added to Season mode
- Up your game with improvements to equipment combining, higher class equipment, and additional boost trainers
- Experience all 30 official ballparks and stadiums in brilliant 3D graphics

Join the MLB Perfect Inning community on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MLBPILIVE

MLB trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball. Visit MLB.com. comments: First of all, interface is confusing. Im playing for 4 days already and am completely lost. The "fast" games are horrible due to the lack of good players initially available. My best batter is 86, I just played a game (thats why i am writing the review) where the opponent had all the 3 pitcher above 125. It is very common to get opponents with rating a+ while im at only at C. That is very frustrating. So go straight forward to leagues where you can see recomendation on how high u need ur rating

Everything is good. Gameplay, quality, server speed but I hate the commentator. I've played lots of sports games and this byfar has the greatest gameplay I've ever played on Android, the only thing that irritates me is the commentator, please improve it. Its a great game, but the commentator gives me chills, so cringy, repetative voices, no excitement when I hit homerun, plain voice. Also, match ups in PVP is not balanced especially for starters

The game really has been very disappointing for the 2019 version. Compared to the 2018 version it was so much better. Now it's more of a pay to win game sadly. Also March is half way over in 2020 and there still inst a 2020 version. Early in the 2020 year they gave us some information about the 2020 update and now for the people that still play this gave is left in the dark. It's been over a month and a half since we last got some information and now nothing.

Best baseball game app there is, I've been playing it for 3 years. I love the hitting cursor and not using just timing like all the other games. If u get good at that then u won't complain about being matched up against teams way better than u. Yes if u spend money your team gets better quicker but it took me no time for my team to get to an "A" and 6 months for my team to get to an "S" with no $ spent, only complaint would be updating the announcers but it's no big deal. Keep up the good work!

Previously gave a 5* rating, but as time has wore on it just gets worse. Lack of offline play makes the game useless if you are ever ln the road, and if your internet is lagging for a night forget about playing this game. Requires server maintenance every week for tiny updates. 2020 update has been teased for over 2 months now and nothing yet. I am not confident investing my time or money that my team will be around this year even, let alone the next. Matchmaking is terrible.

title: 2019 US Open Tennis Championships
description:
The United States Tennis Association is pleased to offer the official app for the 2019 US Open Tennis Championships, designed and developed by IBM.  Stay connected to all the action during the Open, August 19 to September 8, 2019.

Key Features include:

Latest
The interactive home screen offers fans an immersive experience into the US Open with immediate access to live scores and latest news, photos, and videos.
Live Scores – Analytics & Insights by IBM
LIVE exclusive point-by-point scoring updates, completed match results, statistics, match insights and IBM Keys to the Match during the US Open.
Tickets
US Open Tickets are mobile-only.  Use your phone to purchase, view, scan your ticket at the gate, or transfer your tickets. 
 
Visit
The Visit section is your main resource for all information regarding visiting the USTA Billie Jean King National Tennis Center including what you can bring, dining and food options, restaurants reservations, and more.
 
Other Features
Match Highlights, Official Schedule of Play, Player Bios, Draws, CHASE Charge & Watch.

comments: Garbage app. It looks like it was designed 15 years ago. Awful, dull, boring, outdated UI. App frequently crashes, fails to notify, and is non-responsive. The video doesn't work at all. The US Tennis Federation ought to be ashamed of itself. This app is lightyears behind the excellent Wimbledon app. If the app was a player, he or she wouldn't even be ranked in the top 500 in the world.

Terrible app when trying to navigate back and forth, since when trying to go back, the previous screen coming back is never keeping your settings, and you have again and again to set-up your filters. So, even if the details and links are many and usefully, when you are accessing one, to get the details about a match or a player, when trying to return you need to start again choosing the specific date and then scroll to your previous point, so loosing a lot of time for this back and forth issues.

I downloaded the app to be able to watch live events. And as so many others have said - LIVE STREAMING WILL NOT WORK ! I have an Android S9 . Had this app on my old Droid Razor ...couple if years ago , and it worked fine...watched many matches. Reloaded it a few times to no avail...So many complaints here about this . Fix the damn app !!

Another awesome experience at the U.S. Open! Everything that you need is provided in the App! I love that my tickets were scanned directly from my phone to enter into the park daily. Worry free...The scavenger hunt earning badges was fun as well. Very user friendly!

Don't waste your time. Every year it gets more and more unreliable. Developers don't care about listening to users and improving the app so get your open info elsewhere. Couldn't give it a zero, which is what it deserves

title: Smart Gangster Crime City 2019
description:
Smart Gangster Crime City 2019 is a gangster hero fusion game. You would love this san andreas City Gangster style gameplay. In this vice city you have all the power to go and get anything you want. Your character is the grand theft of all but inside his is the good guy and the rockstar social club worker with dancing skills. In this san andreas type crime city you have open world environment with small missions to get rewards .Fight for Survival in the hopeless land of crime where no one is innocent and unarmed. 

Run with Super Light Speed in a flash like super hero. You have four different characters with speed hero robot electric fire powers. In the most intense speed flying superhero robot games, control speedster electric superhero speedster simulator, move fast to the grand city and shoot all criminals one by one ,mafia superhero robot city battle in this transforming electric robot and fictional light smart gangster superhero force games

Your Gangster have a large variety of deadly weapons including mechineguns. Includes Car Theft , Motorbike Grabbing Helicopter flying and many more.  Destroyable car and bike models with in-game physics for more realistic gameplay. You will forget the miami crime or vagus crime. The criminal smart gangster can drive and fly and keep shooting people without the fear of gating caught. 

It is one of the amazing crime city rescue simulator speed robot game. where you will experience of flash robot laser beams or light flying adventure around the city crime battlefield as speed robot steel hero or Dr robot hero legend. It has many city rescuing missions and as a true light superhero, you have to save your city and save the peoples during the combat with mafia terrorists and city criminals as a spider hero or from any other dangerous you see your people. All guiltless individuals are in real threat and you have called to the city for save and defend them from folks monsters. move fast and rescue the people or animals if you see an they need your help.Be a brave speed robot rescue hero robot over gun shooting action.Experience the thrill and crazy adventure of being an electric light speed hero. finish or hanged the gangster and monsters of crime city, join the superheroes fighting. Take down all the mafia city gangster down and win the title among the best criminal smart gangster superhero games of super speed flashing iron robot hero. Speed flash hero engages in realistic city battle with evil monsters members which have planned the deadliest city wars to create panic and scare in the city and take control of the city and the survival of the city. In this ultimate action speedo robot city rescue gameplay as light speed hero. 
Play with your favorite speed hero or speed girl hero character. Its your choice to be a super hero girl or be a super villain crime girl. There are  plenty of Deadliest Supervillain Crime Bosses At the mission points to fight with

The big crime pretty city is open for you. Spaceships and robots have attacked your crime city and now its you or them.  Express your magical powers and become a real superhero or behave like a regular mad rider . Earn cash coins and gems by completing missions and quests and unlocking achievements. Mass killing, street racing, Car Theft, Bike Race, Bike theft, Helicopter or chopper flying  and collecting pickups.  Spend money in the store to unlock other players. There are different guns, cars and clothes available for purchase 

Gangs don't sleep in your town. The crime rages on the streets. Answer them counter hurricane! Tap the button and lift objects in the air! Send your enemies high flying! Or just take a weapon and bang'em by shooting!

recentChanges:
Notifications fix and Match Centre bug fixes including cropped score on small screens.

As the matches begin at RWC 2019 follow them live on the app.

Also, release your inner pundit and play our RWC Match Predictor game by predicting the winner of each match, the result and the first try scorer within our global leaderboard or your own mini-league.
comments: Inaccurate scores, team members missing from squads, odd navigation, it feels a bit thrown together. An example of odd navigation, click on Teams and you get no info about the squad. Click on Pools then teams and you get it. Surely it should be the same Teams page. Example of team members missing, how about the Welsh captain? Pretty poor. Update, the players are there, just can't see them, not displaying properly.

Great app. Loving the content. Videos are neat but would like to see more of the off the field vids. Send them in teams. We're a few games in now and I can't get the predictor to work for me. Keeps asking for a log in when I backpage out. Elma is fun but she needs a Japanese side kick to go next level. Just updated and hope that fixes the predictor.

This app when released griped me a lot. The team have done a fantastic job with updates and it works far better than anything else I've ever used for sport updates. A proper showcase in how to present information on a logical format, with navigation that is sensible and fluid. Kudos to the development team on this one.

Way too many notifications. Had to go into my phone's general settings to block the notifications because they get re-enabled if you turn them off within the app itself. Also, the group tables show the teams in reverse order, so the group leaders are at the bottom

Two of the most important matches are not shown under "matches". They're under "results". (Eng-France & NZ-Italy). Poor show in the circumstances. Also, scores were frequently given the wrong way around. Otherwise it's a comprehensive app.

title: Google I/O 2019
description:
The official Google I/O 2019 conference app is your co-pilot to navigate the conference, whether you're attending in-person or remotely. With the app, you can:

• Explore the conference schedule, with details on topics and speakers
• Save events to Schedule, your personalized schedule
• Get reminders before events you've saved in Schedule start
• Sync your custom schedule between all of your devices and the I/O website
• Guide yourself using the vector-based conference map
• Opt-in to receive important notifications about the event, schedule, travel, after hours, session recordings and more

Exclusive for onsite attendees:
• Take advantage of facilitated pre-event WiFi configuration
• Reserve seats for events ahead of schedule

Source code for the app will be available soon after I/O.

comments: The schedule is terrible. Going to event details and back resets your scrolling position. There are way too many events for this simple list representation and filtering doesn't help much. Search is a joke when you try to find a session because there are many of them with the same name and you have to go to details to see the time, the list is not sorted by time either. Shuttle bus schedule is missing from the app so you have to go to the web version to see it.

Major issue:  Night mode setting on Galaxy S10 does not trigger automatic night mode.  "Always On" nor "Automatically" in developer settings does not turn on dark mode, but it does in all other Google apps that support the Android 9 night mode.  The only apps from Google to have issues with this is I/O 2019, the newest update to Google Contacts (it worked prior to latest update), and the new update to Google Calculator.  Google Play Games is the best version of dark mode implemented - it respects A) Battery Saver, B) Night mode (auto or manual), and C) colors the navigation bar the same color as the theme.

I look forward to updating to five stars as soon as this bug is fixed. I had thought the problem was the sign-in, but that's not it. Upon opening it this morning, I was already signed in. Every time the app loads, I see the seconds counter change once and when it tries to change the second time, the old digit disappears but the slot just stays white as the app crashes. I think it's a coincidence and the app crashes 2-5 secs after the UI fully displays. Motorola X Pure, Build 25.211.1 Good luck!

For being an app from Google, this is astonishingly bad. It's crashed several time, UI elements resize randomly, the data backing the list of sessions seems to be disconnected from the UI, session times appear to change from EST to PST and back again. Do better, Google!

crashes frequently. hard to get required information about talks. for some reason the option to reserve talks is not in my app build, which means i have to be standby for every talk, verified this bug with other attendees, who are actually able to reserve talks

title: Cargo Simulator 2019: Turkey
description:
Cargo Simulator 2019: Turkey is the first truck driving simulator that contains the real Turkey map and cities with scaled roads. 

You can have a unique driving experience with various trucks and trailers on an enormous map. Each delivery contributes to your budget and helps you to pruchase new trucks.

You will start your journey in Ankara and continue in all the cities of Turkey from west to east.

The game creates an ultimate truck driving experience with the advanced physics engine and realistic truck and trailer models.

You can stop by the roadside showrooms and take a look at the various trucks for sale during your trips. 

The game includes the transportation jobs of a wide selection of cargoes including foods, fuel tankers, chemicals, concrete or different construction machines such as excavators, loaders and dozers.

In this simulation, you need to be careful in traffic not to give any damage to the cargo. Damages might decrease your income from the deliveries. 

Cargo Simulator 2019: Turkey game will continue to have more exciting features in the future.

title: NFL 2020: American Football League Manager Game
description:
NFL 2019: American Football League Manager is the NFL’s official draft strategy game. This is your chance to develop the right strategy for your favorite team. The NFL season has already begun, and the goal is the same as every year: to win the Super Bowl!

This 2018-2019 draft campaign will be more difficult than ever. Work as a general manager to get the best quarterback, linebackers and linemen on the market. Become the Super Bowl NFL champions like the New England Patriots. Get superstars like Tom Brady, Aaron Rodgers, Richard Sherman, Carson Wentz or Le'Veon Bell to play for you. Are you ready to dominate the National Football League? Win every NFL game!

NFL 2019: Football League Manager has the official license from the NFL. Join us in the best PvP football manager 2019 game with your friends from all over the sports world.

Become the best football manager coach of the 2018/2019 season. Decide on your strategy to become the champs of the Super Bowl. Will you manage to take a rookie to the All Pro Game?

In this NFL game you will be the manager of Tom Brady, one of the best quarterbacks in gridiron history. Win the Super Bowl and rewrite the course of your franchise!

LEAD THE REGULAR SEASON LEAGUE AND THE PLAYOFFS

The competition is long, and you will need to motivate and coach your stars to improve their performance throughout the year. Will you be the champions and win a NFL ring like the New England Patriots? For that you will need to act like a card trader and exchange players, working towards a balanced squad.

MANAGE YOUR FRANCHISE IN THIS AMERICAN FOOTBALL MANAGER GAME

In this official NFL football manager game you will have to coach your team to win the 2019 NFL champions national league. How will you adjust tactics when you are losing and the game is on the line? Will you be the best sports manager of the draft?

Take your franchise to the next level by winning the Super Bowl national league. You can manage players like Richard Sherman or Tom Brady, the legendary quarterback of gridiron.

TRAIN & COACH YOUR PLAYERS TO WIN THE RUGBY LEAGUE

Train your quarterback to pass the football and your running backs to get it into the end zone. Master the tackle technique with your defensive players and practice field goals with your kicker. Training the right moves is what will help you overcome the tension in the crucial moments, especially if you need a last-minute touchdown or a Hail Mary. This is when the real leaders prove their worth. In this NFL football manager game all the details count to become the final football champion.

Will your team win the 2019 Super Bowl and the Lombardi Trophy and will be your QB the MVP of the year? Become the best scoring into the goalpost in this gridiron game!

If you like American Football Super Bowl games, you will love this official NFL game. Become the champions like the New England Patriots!

BECOME A TEAM CREATOR LEGEND

Never lose a rugby game by lining up an unbeatable formation of NFL football players. You become the team creator and your fans will support your team to the end! It is in your hand to manage the situation with the help of your best companion, like the quarterback Tom Brady. Do not miss the opportunity! Don't worry if your shot does not go into the goalpost, try again!

Super Bowl games like the NFL 2019: American Football League Manager are the ones that get the best from their players. Similar to trading cards games, this game allows you to exchange players to have a balanced team, both on offense and defense. Form a fantasy lineup and become a legend of the NFL Champs!

If you like Super Bowl games you will love this new NFL manager game.

Support: In the game: “More - Support” or at www.fromthebench.zendesk.com
Forum: https://fromthebench.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/community/topics/360000702654-NFL-Manager

Start your career in sports and become a Super Bowl football manager 2019! Download the official licensed NFL 2019: Football League Manager now!

recentChanges:
PLAY THE NEW EVENTS DURING THE PRESEASON

We're launching the first part of the most anticipated feature of the year: EVENTS!

Get ready for a new way of competing where you'll have to select different players to compete in each event, with surprise boosters, new Superstar player rewards, minigames and new game modes. It's a whole world of fun for the new NFL season!

We'll be keeping an eye on your comments to be sure to turn what's fun into something even more fun!
comments: Awful. You MUST give the your Facebook contacts to progress in leagues! (I don't have any). No tactics or strategy, formations, plays, strengths or anything. I started with no RBs, out of position OL and still won games. There is no visible logic in the game stats or buying players. The game just uses timers for player development or obtaining energy, cash or coins. Or you have to watch Google ads to speed up timers. One massive clickbait. Nothing to do with football tactics whatsoever.

A few bugs it seems, but not a real problem. Wish I had a playbook and could actually call my own plays and watch the results of the play. Guess time is a factor concerning a playbook and play results. Enjoying the game so far. Have only been playing for 3 days. Addendum: Have been playing for a little over a month now. Some of the bugs are very irrittating. Expect to get my daily prizes at all times, but dont always recieve them. Great game all in all. Game developers, please fix the bugs.

Videos are not available far too often. Power rating is too difficult to understand. I also had hundreds of boosts that just disappeared overnight. I'll keep playing for a bit, but I'm starting to get irritated.
Be cool if there were a franchise chat for battles or a way to ping for help filling the 2x bar
every time I try to watch a video there is none available. good game if you can fix this and give us more opportunities to win more contracts

title: Moto 2019 - Highway Speed Rider
description:
The most amazing road bike game in 2019 waiting for you to challenge!
Come and experience the extreme speed!
Your instant reaction will meet big challenges if you want to be the best motorcyclist!

Features:
★	You want the motorcycle you choose
A variety of cool motorcycles with unique colors, different gears and configurations of each, giving you different road bike experiences!

★	Here you can find any modes you want
Career Mode- for you to pass multiple levels
Time Mode- arrive at the target place in the limited time
Free Mode- freely explore the game and control your car in the way you like
Endless Mode- challenge your highest record

★	One-way/two-way lanesat your option
Practice at the one-way lane and challenge the two-way lane. Use your skills to avoid more vehicles. You’ll fall in love with this stimulating feeling!

The gameplay is very simple- bring your helmet, turn your throttle, and hear the sound of the engine. Then just try to move forward! Enjoy the speed and the excitement on this road! You are the most powerful motorcycle rider!

Beautiful graphics and easy control, the detail within the game is great, for example, the chaos sound within the tunnel. Thumb up for this game
Super cool motors, though everyone was told that safety first when you are driving, but within the game, seems it is not true, I can chase for the speed as I like, lol…

title: Airplane Flight Adventure 2019
description:
Hey there! Have you always wanted to fly your own airplane private jet? This is your chance to make all your airplane flying dreams come true and have the flying time of your life! This is an incredible flying simulator if you are looking for a highly realistic airplane jet flying experience! So come and jump in on this crazy airplane pilot jet flying simulator 2019!

Complete challenging mission levels and earn rewards. The airplane jet flying city simulator will give you the ultimate thrill of a private jet flying pilot experience. This is your chance to make all your challenging private airplane jet flying simulator dreams come true. Make sure to keep an eye on the timer and complete your mission levels in time!

You will be given a really exciting mission goals in each level! You will have to control your huge flying airplane and make it through all the airplane flight mission checkpoints. You will have to collect all the stars in order to become the best private airplane jet pilot in town! The highly realistic physics will keep you engaged into the airplane jet flying pilot duties.

The tutorial mode will make it really easy for you to get used to the airplane jet pilot simulator responsibilities. After learning in the tutorial mode, you can test your air jet plane flying skills in the career mode! It is now time to become the best jet flying pilot in town and have the time airplane flying time of your life!


Features:
Learn how to fly your private airplane jet and earn awesome rewards by flying in the tutorial mode.
The amazing HD Graphics will make your private airplane jet flying experience even better!
The crazy sound effects will make you feel as if you are flying in your own airplane jet simulator!
Complete your challenging flight missions in the given time!
Make sure to keep an eye on the radar map to see your current location and destination!
Select the private airplane jet of your dreams and get ready to fly high!
Get through the checkpoints and collect all the stars to complete your mission level!
Complete levels by achieving your mission goals and unlock new challenging mission levels!
Make all your jet flying dreams come true with this highly realistic Airplane jet flying simulator 2019.

title: Fighting Manager 2019:Martial Arts Game
description:
Enjoy martial art manager game app and live training how to fight face to face, unarmed, with your punches and kicks how to use yourself with amazing skill to block the enemy kicks and punches is also essential part of martial arts. The real boxing experience in your hand, make jab, hook, and uppercut feel natural and fun. Use quick reflexes and clever moves, unleash ferocious punches and combos, defeat all rivals and become the king of boxing ring. fight champion-ship is an exciting fighting action game app, it is the adventures 3d fighting game app to enjoy martial arts fighting tiger. This martial arts training game app will teaches you a variety of Karate, Jui Jitsu, Muay Thai, Wrestling, Judo, Boxing, Aikido and other  arts forms that will give you a wide range of skills and a wide-range fighting lessons. Amazing variants of quick moves can be realistic in a variety of situations in a fight, this live training game introduces you to these positions and allows you to learn correct practice & technique.


Martial arts is a fighting sport that needs a competitor to have a variety of skills that can include grappling, kicking, punching, and defense. Earn points for each wining against opponent, fight against powerful rivals and level up your martial arts & karate fighting skills to get top level ranking. Your rivals use diverse fighting styles including taekwondo, muay thai, kung fu, boxing and other, show your top level fighting skills to overcome all of opponents with the power of kung fu karate tiger claw style. Go toe-to-toe against 30+ bone crushing boxers from Bangkok, Las Vegas, London, Montreal and Washington. Fight against powerful fighting rivals, win over them and earn points to unlock new ranks of your progression. Upgrade your power, speed, and accuracy with new strikes and fighting styles getting points for each winning match. World kung fu king live training game-play, fighting animations, special 3d effects, thrilling sounds and real fighting styles.


Fighting Manager 2019:Martial Art Game Features:

Martial arts in fight champion-ship game
Face toughest martial art fighters and become world champion 
Fanatical heavy weight champions fight against your muay Thai punch boxer
Fight against toughest martial arts fighters and become world champion
Level up by defeating legendary fighters in world tournament 
Win fighting matches & get rewarded points to unlock next tournament 
Martial arts tournaments with big rewards
3d animations and realistic quality sound heat your blood
Background music & sound effects will increase your energy in tag team karate ring

title: Offroad SUV Drive 2019
description:
Are you ready for the offroad jeep adventure 2019 on mountains and uphill roads? If yes then it's time to get off the road with SUV car driving in a new open world environment! Experience the thrill of uphill driving jeeps, Hilux, Hummer, Pickup trucks and Prado cars over dirt mountain tracks. The 4x4 offroad vehicles are powerful enough to perform amazing stunts over the ramps and climb steep hill roads.

Get behind the wheel of a powerful land cruiser to drive through dirt, mud, water flows and narrow gravel. Feel the 4x4 offroaders adventure while climbing hills, wooden bridges and mountains. In this off-road car simulator 2k19, you can drive the Russian 4x4 SUV cars to climb both uphill and downhill steep paths.

Grip the steering wheels of powerful 4x4 offroad gears to jump over mountains using tyres suspension and handling. Conquer the narrow roads that seems like impossible tracks to drive on. This SUV offroad simulation game 2019 is a real off-road trip for adventure-seeking drivers.

Select your favorite off road 4 wheeler vehicles and complete each level within time and be the best of extreme 4x4 jeep driver. Race motorsports as you like but don't fall down, stuck or crash while driving across dangerous paths. Collect coins to unlock new crossover sports utility vehicles and MUV.

Features of Offroad SUV Drive 2019:
- It's Free and can be played offline
- Amazing Open-world desert and hill environment
- HUD including revs, speed, and tires
- Various camera angles

title: Be the Manager 2019 - Football Strategy
description:
•••Be The Manager••• Season 2018 / 2019••• 

Played on Android since 2012 and with millions of downloads worldwide, Be The manager now in the seventh edition!
Manage a football club, take part in the championships, defeat strong rivals. In this game you will need to efficiently manage the activity of a soccer club and take it to the top lines of the rating. Buy and sell football players to gather the team of your dream. Train promising players and raise their characteristics. Develop a strategy for each match. Make contracts with sponsors. Upgrade your stadium. Study game statistics. Be the Manager 2019 is a captivating football manager game. It’s simple and fun. But also immersive and challenging.


2019 GAME FEATURES:

• 2018 / 2019 database with REAL TEAMS, MANAGERS and PLAYERS
